# bot_groups

	This page was last generated 2022.06.18

## Relationship Diagram

[Diagram Edit](https://mermaid.live/edit#){target=diagram-edit}

[![](https://mermaid.)](https://mermaid.){target=diagram}

## Relationships

| Relationship Type | Local Key | Relates to Table | Foreign Key |
| :--- | :--- | :--- | :--- |
| One-to-One | group_leader_id | [bot_data](../../schema/bots/bot_data.md) | bot_id |
| Has-Many | groups_index | [bot_group_members](../../schema/bots/bot_group_members.md) | groups_index |


## Schema

| Column | Data Type | Description |
| :--- | :--- | :--- |
| groups_index | int | Unique Group Identifier |
| group_leader_id | int | [Bot Identifier](bot_data.md) |
| group_name | varchar | Group Name |
